question.txt: Which of the following is an example of a “phishing” attack?
question.answer: Sending someone an email that contains a malicious link that is disguised to look like an email from someone the person knows
Creating a fake website that looks nearly identical to a real website in order to trick users into entering their login information
Sending someone a text message that contains a malicious link that is disguised to look like a notification that the person has won a contest
Telling someone over the phone that they’ve won a prize and in order to redeem it shipping and handling must be paid.
